AMECard.Name: Audio Content Recognition
AMECard.Definition: Matching an audio segment with a reference database.

Input.Name: DBIdentifier
Input.Definition: One or more identifier(s) of the database(s) which holds the descriptors/fingerprints to match against.
Input.Comment: An implementation may use a default database, if no parameter is specified.

Input.Name: MinDuration
Input.Definition: The minimum duration of a segment to be matched

Output.Name: MatchingResults
Output.Definition: Recognised segments, with an identifier of the database entry that matched, and optionally a score (strength) for the match.
